name: TERMINAL VR
description:
BAYONETS: Melee phase one feature.


RUSH: Travel on foot through different environments and find your way to the rendezvous location for evacuation. Make the most of your limited support and equipment to push through the infected to your objective.

ARCADE: Outlast extreme weather while fending off infected ambushes. Get animated in order to dodge flying, floating, and rolling debris. Use trial and error to maximize the potential of your weapon

HOLDOUT: Hold your ground against the infected in a classic horde style mode. Use ranged weapons to pick them off from a distance, or just blow them up with a home-made firework launcher. Special abilities such as slow time and sprint can make a difference in tight situations.

INBOUND MODES- (COMING SOON)

THE PIT: A sandbox arena that will feature The Infected, Raiders and Violent Weather. Earn points in the other modes to unlock better weapons for better results.

ARENA: (Coming 0.4) Utilize melee combat and anything from throwing bricks to jabbing with a jackhammer. Use the mode exclusive health regeneration ability to outlast the enemy.

FEATURES:
Snap Turn, Free Rotation, Resolution Control, Graphic Quality Settings.
